entry.title: Monday night: Chance of drizzle. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. 60 percent chance of drizzle before morning. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h before morning. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain or drizzle. High 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle early in the morning. Rain beginning in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 02 January 2023
